snippet.title: Toontown: Corporate Clash - v1.2.5 Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The v1.2.5 Update launches on October 23rd, 2021. Get a sneak peek of some of what is in store in this brand new trailer!

The music used in this trailer was composed by Main, which you'll hear in-game as part of an upcoming Roadster Raceway musical upgrade!

Additionally, it is imperative that you clear out your mailboxes of any items, including what is stored there currently and ensuring any deliveries that are on the way between now and October 23rd are obtained before the update launches. While we cannot go into detail why as of yet, it'll soon make sense. Big changes are coming that'll impact the databases of all current Toons, and you'll need to make sure this happens before launch day. Any items still lingering in your mailbox after this date will be cleared out.


▼  Connect with us:
Join our Team: https://corporateclash.net/apply
Website: https://corporateclash.net
Discord: https://corporateclash.net/social/discord
Twitter: https://corporateclash.net/social/twitter

▼ What is Toontown?

Toontown: Corporate Clash is a completely free to play massively multiplayer online game designed to be the new experience of a game many of us loved. This is a game designed for players of all ages. ANYONE can have fun joining in the battle against the evil robot cogs. So, grab a seltzer and a few pies and dive right into the never ending battle to save Toontown from the cogs! What are you waiting for?

--

Disclaimer:

Toontown: Corporate Clash is a completely free-to-play independent project funded solely by the team. No revenue of any sort is generated through this game. In no way, form, or shape is Toontown: Corporate Clash connected to or affiliated with The Walt Disney Company and/or the Disney Interactive Media Group.
